name: PMC_search_papers
description: Search for full-text biomedical literature using PMC (PubMed Central) API. PMC is the free full-text archive of biomedical and life sciences journal literature at the U.S. National Institutes of Health's National Library of Medicine.

query.description: Search query for PMC papers. Use keywords separated by spaces to refine your search.

limit.description: Maximum number of papers to return. This sets the maximum number of papers retrieved from PMC.

date_from.description: Start date for publication date filter (YYYY/MM/DD format). Optional parameter to limit search to papers published from this date onwards.

date_to.description: End date for publication date filter (YYYY/MM/DD format). Optional parameter to limit search to papers published up to this date.

article_type.description: Article type filter (e.g., 'research-article', 'review', 'case-report'). Optional parameter to limit search to specific article types.

return_schema.description: List of full-text biomedical papers from PMC matching the search query

doi.description: Digital Object Identifier (DOI) of the paper

url.description: URL to access the paper on PMC

open_access.description: Open access status (always true for PMC)
